notion.comment_1: apiKey, databaseId, and dataSourceId are REQUIRED in v3.0.0
notion.comment_2: Run 'npm run fetch-data-source-id' to get your dataSourceId
notion.comment_4: Set values in your .env file or directly here

dropbox.comment_1: For security, put sensitive values in .env file instead:
